CMD_YTINFO_DESC: Shows information about a YouTube channel, video, or a playlist.
CMD_TWINFO_DESC: Shows information about a Twitch broadcaster, and videos.
DISLIKES_NOTE: *uses the Return YouTube Dislike API, so it might be inaccurate
GCFG_NO_CHANNELS: No channels have been added and configured!
GCFG_NO_BROADCASTERS: No broadcasters have been added and configured!
GCFG_REQUIRES_AUTH: To Y2DL be able to use your Twitch account, you need to authenticate the bot.
GCFG_REQUIRES_AUTH_DESC: Press the button below to authenticate!
GCFG_TWAUTHED: Your Twitch channel is now authenticated!
GCFG_AUTHED_DESC: Now, you just need to configure what Y2DL will gonna do with it!
GCFG_TWAUTH_COMPLETE: Your Twitch channel has been authenticated for Y2DL to use!
GCFG_TWAUTH_COMPLETE_DESC: You can now close this window and go back to Discord to complete the setup.
ERR_FETCH_STREAMER: Can't find the broadcaster or an error occurred!
ERR_FETCH_STREAMER_DESC: Make sure you have inputted the streamer's login name right (note: `twitch.tv/[login name]`).
ERR_FETCH_CHANNEL: Can't find the channel you specified!
ERR_FETCH_CHANNEL_DESC: Make sure you have inputted the channel ID or handle right.
ERR_FETCH_VIDEO: Can't find the video you specified!
ERR_FETCH_VIDEO_DESC:
Make sure you have inputed the video ID right.
Also, make sure the video is accessible.
ERR_CMD_CHNL_TOO_MANY: Only one of `channel_id` or `channel_handle` must be defined.
ERR_CMD_CHNL_TOO_MANY_DESC: Make sure you have used at least one, and not both.
ERR_NOT_THE_COMMAND_EXECUTOR: You are not the one that ran the command!
ERR_NOT_THE_COMMAND_EXECUTOR_DESC: Only the user that ran the command can interact on it.
